title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 229.41 - Non-combustible additives
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 229.41 - Non-combustible additives

State Regulations

Where a company proposes the addition of air or any other
extraneous non-combustible gas other than water vapor to the gas previously
authorized for distribution by this commission, said addition shall not be made
without the specific authorization thereof of this
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
229.41

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
